column4: is there a way to have apt-get check dependinces and remove packages that are no longer needed but got pulled in by another package? ( note if apt-get is debian, sorry and ill hop over there)
autoremove is the option I think
autoremove is not anoption with apt-get there is autoclean but it just remove distfiles and not the installed packages i believe
autoremove should get rid of obsoulte package
